title: Add RGB <-> HSV conversion functions for SKColor (#61)
body:
Issue #61.

This is a direct translation from the Skia functions `SkRGBToHSV` and `SkHSVToColor`. Happy to make any changes.

comments.author: migueldeicaza
comments.body: This looks good, but we should also expose properties like System.Drawing color does to get the individual HSV properties, very much like RGB exist today.

comments.author: migueldeicaza

Oddly, my other comment is gone.

We should also add properties to get the individual HSV properties, like we surface RGB.

comments.author: tdenniston
comments.body:
Thank you @xamarin-cla-bot ...

I fixed the issues from the above comments. I didn't know if we should cache the values of HSV in the SKColor instance or not. Currently they are computed lazily when you use the Hue, Saturation and Value property getters.
